TEXT.TITLE: AMERICA FIRST MORTGAGE SETS SPECIAL PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: <America First Federally Guaranteed Mortgage Fund Two> said it is making a special distribution of 71.6 cts per exchangeable unit, which includes 67.62 cts from return on capital and 3.98 cts from income gains. Reuter
